text: 3.5: Fi 2.16Gu mba bigɨna nɨɨreŋra nzuav, gu thagɨne rargɨ kɨrie? Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap Timoti ga sarigim, ana nden han vugi. Gu nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨva kaŋgi zav ana sarigi. Gu khuen rivgi, nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi, nde muuŋv kɨrim, Satan nden mpɨrarim, nza mba muuŋgi ŋaar, ana fhura mbar ŋgɨgɨrga.
